# acceptsDraggedFiles

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether you can drag a file into the view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var acceptsDraggedFiles: Bool { get set }
```

## Dragging in a View

- **allowsDragging**: A Boolean value indicating whether the view can accept new PDF documents dragged into it by the user.

items.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the view can accept new PDF documents dragged into it by the user.
